Headline: Temporary Northbound #22 Clark Reroute near Dearborn/Van Buren
ShortDescription: Northbound 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted near Dearborn/Van Buren.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Ida B Wells, State, Adams, Dearborn, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Dearborn/Van Buren.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Rosemont
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a door problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
